notes: Sources: ACE-Threats BTR handbook, military periscope, military factory, army recognition. Some analysts and documents list the btr-80a as an IFV, but it lacks sufficient protection to warrant that classification. The modular weapon system is offered for export to upgrade a wide variety of vehicles to a BTR-80A standard. The BTR-80A can mount K1-126 bullet-resistant tires. See separate entry for information on the Kliver turret. See the ace-threats BTR handbook published in 2014 for detailed information on all BTR-60 variants.
